pr_title: [DOCS] Add delete snapshot repo API docs

timeline.message:
[DOCS] Add delete snapshot repo API docs

Adds API reference docs for the delete snapshot repo API.

Also corrects an error in the delete snapshot repo API spec.
Comma-separated repository names are not supported.

timeline.bodyText: TIL we accept wildcards here :) But, trappily, not a comma-separated list.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,52 @@
+[[delete-snapshot-repo-api]]
+=== Delete snapshot repository API
+++++
+<titleabbrev>Delete snapshot repository</titleabbrev>
+++++
+
+Deletes one or more <<snapshots-register-repository,snapshot repositories>>.

timeline.message: relocate delete repo ex. sync wording.
